Esporma Environment Suit.name: Esporma Environment Suit
Esporma Environment Suit.description:
Armored Radiation Suit. Protects the wearer from Radiation and comes with an Oxygen Tank that lasts for 30 minutes which can be refilled by spending an hour in clean air.

Nanomachines restore 1SP every hour SP isn't lost on the armor

PackShield.name: PackShield
PackShield.description:
Businesswear Backpack Bulletproof Shield hybrid.

Can carry items like a @UUID[Compendium.cyberpunk-red-core.core_gear.Item.y2a4HDhIl7FlJyD7]{Carryall}, and be equipped in your hand like a shield.

Only provides protection when equipped in a hand.

Cannot be installed in @UUID[Compendium.cyberpunk-red-core.core_cyberware.Item.I08f3hOEgAPNG4kJ]{Popup Shield}.

Integrated Cyberscanner.name: Integrated Cyberscanner
Integrated Cyberscanner.description: Can scan an individual within 2m/yds and provide a list of all installed Cyberware, takes 1 minute. Spits out an error if a Hardened, Tech Upgraded, or Unique piece of Cyberware is detected.

Xtra-Dex Smart Glove.name: Xtra-Dex Smart Glove
Xtra-Dex Smart Glove.description:
A Smart Glove with Cyberfinger support. Has 2 Option Slots for Cyberarm Options and is treated as a @UUID[Compendium.cyberpunk-red-core.black-chrome_cyberware.Item.f9u0uhwRBcunP0gz]{Modular Finger Cyberhand} for the sake of installing the 5 supported Cyberfingers*.

Requires Interface Plugs to access Cyberarm/Cyberfinger Options installed in the glove.

*Modular Finger Cyberhand must be added after Installation.

Cybercam EX-1.name: Cybercam EX-1
Cybercam EX-1.description: Head-mounted camera. A Media presenting a story on a livestream while wearing the Cybercam EX-1 gains +1 Believability when using their role ability. This stacks with evidence based bonuses.

Cyberscanner.name: Cyberscanner
Cyberscanner.description: Can scan an individual within 2m/yds and provide a list of all installed Cyberware, takes 1 minute. Spits out an error if a Hardened, Tech Upgraded, or Unique piece of Cyberware is detected.

Green Light Go Sniffer.name: Green Light Go Sniffer
Green Light Go Sniffer.description: Chemical Substance Analyzer. Provides a green or red glow depending on if the chemical substance (such as Street Drugs or Pharmaceuticals) is clean or cut/mixed with another substance.

Ion Cuffs.name: Ion Cuffs
Ion Cuffs.description: Handcuffs meant for borgs. Disables any Non-Hardened Cyberware options installed in the limb the cuffs are binding. BODYâ‰¥13 can break.

MagViewer.name: MagViewer
MagViewer.description:
Binoculars meant for spotting. Provides detail up to 800m/yds. Provides the user with an additional +1 to an attack roll with a successful Complimentary Skill Check to assist in attacking a target 51m/yds or farther away in addition to any other Complimentary Skill Checks..

Does not stack with @UUID[Compendium.cyberpunk-red-core.core_upgrades.Item.Ryex0KHeeDzPQwmN]{Sniping Scope} or @UUID[Compendium.cyberpunk-red-core.core_cyberware.Item.uApwuxpuIJMe47Vn]{TeleOptics}.

Master Mechanic's Tool Kit.name: Master Mechanic's Tool Kit
Master Mechanic's Tool Kit.description: Massive Tool Chest. Provides a +4 to multiple skills when rolling Maker Skill Checks. Large enough to be considered Thick Steel Cover, requires BODY 10 to move.

MiniMag Speakers.name: MiniMag Speakers
MiniMag Speakers.description: Small Magnetic Speakers. Can play audio from a connected Agent within 100m/yds.

Smartsticks.name: Smartsticks
Smartsticks.description: Smart Drum Sticks. Gives the User a +1 bonus to Play Instrument (Drums) Skill Checks while in use. Doesn't stack with other bonuses to Play Instrument.

Metrocar.name: Metrocar
Metrocar.description: A Cheap Compact Groundcar built for city driving.
